job3.title: Broken Lightbulb
job3.text: Ran into the lamp because I was rushing. Theres shattered glass everywhere. I tried to clean it up a bit but there are probably still little pieces on the ground. Can you come clean up the glass and replace the lightbulb? Its really dark in here and I enjoy studying here, so if you could come as soon as possible that would be great

-Itw50tsgV1wSRjGmpFa.title: Vomit on the floor
-Itw50tsgV1wSRjGmpFa.text: There is an extremely large volume of vomit on the floor and I am unsure how to go about cleaning it up.  I would appreciate if someone could clean it for me.
